q: Robert King , who produces the show with his wife Michelle, said he wanTed Kaufman Donald Rumsfeld to appear as a witness in a lawsuit, testifying about why aggressive interrogation techniques like water-boarding are sometimes needed during wartime. It's an episode about moral relativism about what is considered torture and what is not, Robert King said. But Keith Urbahn , who works for the former defense secretary, said the idea rules Donald Rumsfeld out.`` This area is so fraught with legal ramifications,'' Keith Urbahn said.``

After Kyle Korver sent the game into a third overTim Duncane, Chris Webber delivered a clutch steal and secured the Philadelphia 76ers' 125-124 victory over the Celtics on Friday night. It was an amazing game, Sixers coach Maurice Cheeks said. Was it ever. You can't let that frustrate you. I missed two point-blank foul shots. I'm upset at myself about that. You can't let that one thing get you down. That's what we did, just dug deep and came up with some stops down the stretch. , any quarterback who goes against the Green Bay defense should be in for a long day.`` You're going to get opportunities pretty much every week from pretty much anybody,'' Tramon Williams said. Our job as a defense is to make a quarterback as uncomfortable as you can. There's where we make our plays. If the Packers' playoff victories at Philadelphia and Atlanta are any indication, Jay Cutler will have to do plenty of quick thinking Sunday.
